AboutPage.title: The future of translation
AboutPage.subtitle: Synoptic was born from a simple realization: the world is getting closer, but our books are still monolingual. We built the first cloud-native studio dedicated to the art (and science) of bilingual publishing.
AboutPage.sovereignDesc: We believe that language is the ultimate currency of culture. Our mission is to make bilingualism accessible to everyone, from independent authors to global institutions.
AboutPage.soulDesc: We don't just "auto-translate". Our intelligence engine is grounded in philological precision, ensuring that the nuance of your voice remains intact across every border.
AboutPage.privacyDesc: Your manuscripts are your property. We use secure, siloed infrastructure to ensure your intellectual property never leaves your control.
AboutPage.perfDesc: Built for the modern web. Every interaction in Synoptic is designed for speed, from real-time cloud sync to professional 300 DPI PDF exports.
AboutPage.communityDesc: We are constantly evolving based on feedback from our community of authors, polyglots, and educators.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy @ Synoptic
PrivacyPage.subtitle: We understand that your manuscripts are your soul. Our privacy policy is designed with a single goal: protecting your intellectual property.
PrivacyPage.collectDesc: We only collect what is strictly necessary to run the studio: your email for authentication, and your project data to allow for real-time cloud sync and AI-assisted layout.
PrivacyPage.protectDesc: We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data both in transit and at rest. Our secure infrastructure is monitored 24/7 for privacy and security.
PrivacyPage.aiPrivacyDesc: Your manuscripts are NOT used to train global AI models. We use specialized, siloed agents that process your text in real-time and clear the memory buffer immediately after the task is complete.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.subtitle: Clear rules for a better studio. By using Synoptic, you agree to these terms.
TermsPage.ownershipDesc: You retain 100% ownership of your manuscripts, translations, and any generated exports. Synoptic does NOT claim any rights to your intellectual property.
TermsPage.useDesc: You agree not to use Synoptic for generating or publishing material that is illegal, defamatory, or violates international copyright laws.
useItems: No automated scraping or bulk API usage.
No reverse-engineering of our intelligence engine.
Respect the Fair Use policy for AI Units.
TermsPage.subTitle: Subscription & Termination
TermsPage.subDesc: Subscriptions are billed in advance. You can cancel at any time. Upon cancellation, you will retain access to your projects until the end of the billing period.

immersion.title: The Science of Side-by-Side
immersion.p1: Reading in your target language is the most effective way to acquire vocabulary naturally. But jumping into a foreign book can be overwhelming.
immersion.p2: Synoptic eliminates that barrier. By providing a perfect, sentence-aligned translation right next to your text, we allow your brain to focus on the story while effortlessly mapping new words and structures.
